## [Topics](/documentation/arkit/objective-c-compatibility#topics)

### [Objective-C compatibility types](/documentation/arkit/objective-c-compatibility#Objective-C-compatibility-types)

[`protocol OS_ar_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_anchor)The identity, location, and orientation of an object in world space.[`protocol OS_ar_trackable_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_trackable_anchor)An anchor that can gain and lose its tracking state over the course of a session.[`protocol OS_ar_authorization_result`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_authorization_result)An authorization result.[`protocol OS_ar_authorization_results`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_authorization_results)A collection of authorization results.[`protocol OS_ar_data_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_data_provider)A source of live data from ARKit.[`protocol OS_ar_device_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_device_anchor)The position and orientation of Apple Vision Pro.[`protocol OS_ar_error`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_error)An error reported by ARKit.[`protocol OS_ar_data_providers`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_data_providers)A source of live data from ARKit.[`protocol OS_ar_geometry_element`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_geometry_element)A container for vertex indices of lines or triangles.[`protocol OS_ar_geometry_source`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_geometry_source)A container for geometrical vector data.[`protocol OS_ar_hand_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_hand_anchor)A hand’s position in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_hand_skeleton`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_hand_skeleton)[`protocol OS_ar_hand_tracking_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_hand_tracking_provider)A source of live data about the position of a person’s hands and hand joints.[`protocol OS_ar_hand_tracking_configuration`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_hand_tracking_configuration)[`protocol OS_ar_image_tracking_configuration`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_image_tracking_configuration)[`protocol OS_ar_plane_detection_configuration`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_plane_detection_configuration)[`protocol OS_ar_plane_extent`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_plane_extent)The size of a plane.[`protocol OS_ar_reference_images`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_reference_images)A collection of reference images.[`protocol OS_ar_scene_reconstruction_configuration`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_scene_reconstruction_configuration)[`protocol OS_ar_session`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_session)The main entry point for receiving data from ARKit.[`protocol OS_ar_world_tracking_configuration`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_world_tracking_configuration)[`protocol OS_ar_image_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_image_anchor)A 2D image’s position in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_image_anchors`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_image_anchors)A collection of image anchors.[`protocol OS_ar_image_tracking_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_image_tracking_provider)A source of live data about a 2D image’s position in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_mesh_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_mesh_anchor)A source of live data about a 2D image’s position in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_mesh_anchors`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_mesh_anchors)A collection of mech anchors.[`protocol OS_ar_mesh_geometry`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_mesh_geometry)The shapes that make up a mesh anchor.[`protocol OS_ar_plane_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_plane_anchor)An anchor that represents horizontal and vertical planes.[`protocol OS_ar_plane_anchors`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_plane_anchors)A collection of plane anchors.[`protocol OS_ar_plane_detection_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_plane_detection_provider)A source of live data about planes in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_plane_geometry`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_plane_geometry)The geometry of a plane anchor.[`protocol OS_ar_reference_image`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_reference_image)A 2D image the system uses as a reference to find the same image in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_scene_reconstruction_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_scene_reconstruction_provider)A source of live data about the shape of a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_skeleton_joint`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_skeleton_joint)[`protocol OS_ar_world_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_world_anchor)A fixed location in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_world_anchors`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_world_anchors)A collection of world anchors.[`protocol OS_ar_world_tracking_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_world_tracking_provider)A source of live data about the device pose and anchors in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_barcode_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_barcode_anchor)[`protocol
